docs.text: Drupal Update Core Check if the project uses drupal/core-recommended composer show drupal/core-recommended Check for available Drupal update composer outdated "drupal/*" Update Drupal core code composer update drupal/core “drupal/core-*” --with-all-dependencies Run database update drush updatedb drush cache:rebuild Update Modules composer update drupal/modulename --with-dependencies
docs.title: Drupal
Check if the project uses drupal/core-recommended

docs.text: Frameworks TailwindCSS CLI with npx npx tailwindcss -o ./css/styles/css --jit --purge “./**/*.html” --watch Installing TailwindCSS locally npm init -y npm install -D @tailwindcss/jit tailwindcss postcss npx tailwindcss init -p Modify package.json file # change “test”: “echo...” line to the following “start: “tailwindcss -i ./src/styles.css -o ./build/css/styles.css --watch” Add imports to src/styles.css file @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; Start project npm start Svelte Create a new project npx degit sveltejs/template my-svelte-project cd my-svelte-project node scripts/setupTypeScript.js //Optional, convert to TypeScript npm install Run project npm run dev Check errors npx svelte-check MkDocs Installation pip install mkdocs Creating a new project mkdocs new my-project cd my-project Start server mkdocs serve Build static site mkdocs build
docs.title: Frameworks

docs.text: npm init -y npm install -D @tailwindcss/jit tailwindcss postcss npx tailwindcss init -p
docs.title: Installing TailwindCSS locally

docs.text: npx degit sveltejs/template my-svelte-project cd my-svelte-project node scripts/setupTypeScript.js //Optional, convert to TypeScript npm install
docs.title: Create a new project

docs.text: Git Branching Compare branch data git diff --color-words this_branch..that_branch Show changes to a file git diff --color-words filename.ext Remove branch git branch -d name-of-branch List branches git branch Create a new branch git branch [branch-name] Switch to another branch git checkout [branch] Create a branch and immediately switch to it git checkout -b [branch] Merge branch git merge [branch] git merge [branch] --ff-only Remote Check Remote git remote -v Add Remote git remote add origin path-to-repo Remove Remote git remote rm origin Rename Remote git remote rename previous newname
docs.title: Git
Create a branch and immediately switch to it

docs.text: Markdown Headers # h1 ## h2 ### h3 #### h4 ##### h5 ###### h6 Header 1 ======== Header 2 -------- Emphasis *italic* _italic_ **bold** __bold__ ***bold italic*** ___bold italic___ ~~strikethrough~~ `code` Lists * Item 1 * Item 2 - Item 1 - Item 2 - [ ] Checkbox off - [x] Checkbox on 1. Item 1 2. Item 2 Code 4 space indent makes a code block ``` code fences ``` ```js codeFences.withLanguage() ``` Tables | Column 1 Heading | Column 2 Heading | | ---------------- | ---------------- | | Some content | Other content | Column 1 Heading | Column 2 Heading --- | --- Some content | Other content Links [link](http://google.com) [link][google] [google]: http://google.com http://google.com Images ![Image alt text](/path/to/img.jpg) ![Image alt text](/path/to/img.jpg "title") ![Image alt text][img] [img]: http://foo.com/img.jpg Horizontal line ---- **** Blockquotes This is a blockquote Nested Blockquote
